message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a great opportunity to get your hands on something truly valuable. I'm willing to sell it to you for $120.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $110. Can you consider meeting me halfway?

I understand you're interested in the product, but I'm not quite ready to meet you at $110. I'm willing to compromise and offer it to you for $125. It's a great deal, and I think you'll really appreciate the value it brings.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to meet me at $115?

I understand you're still a bit above your budget, but I'm willing to make another compromise. I'm willing to offer it to you for $130. It's a great deal, and I think you'll really appreciate the value it brings.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still not quite there. Would you be willing to meet me at $120?

I understand you're getting close to your budget, but I'm not willing to go all the way to $120. I'm willing to offer it to you for $127. It's a great deal, and I think you'll really appreciate the value it brings.
I'm getting close to my budget, but I'm still a bit hesitant. Would you be willing to meet me at $125?
